name: Ur Martolod
description:
Ur Martolod

♪♫ Tri martolod yaouank tralala lalilala tri martolod yaouank o voned da veajiñ ♪♫

Ur-Martolod is my solo contribution to the TPH game jam. It's made with my own game engine.

The game is unfinished, so there is no end to the game. The game was supposed to have events based on the state of the boat equipment, but these haven't been implemented.

Story

You are Gwenaël, a fisherman from Sant-Maloù. The king Nominoë of the Kingdom of Brittany asked you to be the FIRST to reach Douar-Nevez.

Be careful of your opponents, the Elsass Republic and the Occitanian Empire.

You need to keep the boat floating while you travel, to do that you'll need to accomplish 3 tasks every day.

If the tasks are well accomplished we will surely reach Douar-Nevez first.

Controls

  • W,A,S,D: Move
  • Spacebar: Attack
  • Return: Execute action, sleep
  • R: (Debug) Respawn
  • P: (Debug) Spawn pirates
